title: 85/191/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 March 1985 on the sixth amendment of Decision 82/467/EEC authorizing a number of Member States to sell butter at a reduced price in the form of concentrated butter (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 18 March 1985
on the sixth amendment of Decision 82/467/EEC authorizing a number of Member States to sell butter at a reduced price in the form of concentrated butter
(Only the German text is authentic)
(85/191/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Decision 82/467/EEC, the quantity of '13 000 tonnes' shown for the Federal Republic of Germany is hereby replaced by '17 000 tonnes'.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
